verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa kahe,--vipra, tumi yāha sva-bhavane
sabhā kari' more tumi kariha smaraṇe

synonyms: kṛṣṇa kahe—Lord Kṛṣṇa says; vipra—My dear brāhmaṇa; tumi—you; yāha—go back; sva-bhavane—to your own home; sabhā kari'-calling a meeting of all the men; more—of Me; tumi—you; kariha—just do; smaraṇe—remembering.
translation: Lord Kṛṣṇa replied, "My dear brāhmaṇa, go back to your home and call a meeting of all the men. In that meeting, just try to remember Me.
